Class UniversalTuringMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

              • utm.UniversalTuringMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class UniversalTuringMachine
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class simulates a Universal Turing Machine (UTM).
    Author:
    Damian Arellanes
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • UniversalTuringMachine

        public UniversalTuringMachine()
        Creates a new UTM with an empty TM.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTuringMachine

        public void loadTuringMachine​(TuringMachine turingMachine)
        Loads a TM onto the UTM.
        Parameters:
        turingMachine - The TM that will be run on the UTM.

      • loadInput

        public void loadInput​(java.lang.String input)
        Loads content into the tape of the current TM and resets the head to its initial position.
        Parameters:
        input - The string that will be used to fill the tape.

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays the window for the UTM GUI.

      • moveHead

        public void moveHead​(Move move,
                     boolean isAnimated)
        Graphically moves the head of the current TM.
        Parameters:
        move - The direction in which the head will move (only RIGHT or LEFT).
        isAnimated - If this flag is set, a delay will be triggered to animate the head movement.

      • updateHeadState

        public void updateHeadState​(java.lang.String state)
        Updates and renders the state of the loaded TM.
        Parameters:
        state - A string representing the new state of the TM.

      • writeOnCurrentCell

        public void writeOnCurrentCell​(char symbol)
        Graphically writes a new symbol on the cell where the head points to.
        Parameters:
        symbol - A character representing the symbol being written.

      • displayHaltState

        public void displayHaltState​(HaltState haltState)
        Displays the result of the execution of the loaded TM.
        Parameters:
        haltState - The halt state to be displayed.

      • getTuringMachine

        public TuringMachine getTuringMachine()
        Gets the TM that has been loaded onto the UTM.
        Returns:
        The abstract data type representing the loaded TM.
